job.title: Software Engineer, Backend
job.description: pstrongAbout CalmstrongppWe have a simple mission at Calm To make the world a happier and healthier place The heart of Calm is digital but the brand is expanding offline into a variety of products and services that bring more peace clarity and perspective into peoples busy lives Calm is passionate about helping people take care of their minds and we believe that Calm can become one of the most valuable and meaningful brands in the worldnbsppulliImproving Concentration and AwarenessliliReducing AnxietyliliImproving Memory and CreativityliliHigher EQliliIncreasing HappinessliliGetting Better SleepliulpbrppCalm is the 1 consumer brand for digital health with over 100 million downloads 100K new per day We weren named Apples App of the Year and the worlds first mental health unicorn Inc 5000 cited Calm as the 19th Fastest Growing Private Company in America and we were voted the Worlds Happiest App by the Center for Humane TechnologynbspppCheck out thenbspCalm Careers Pagenbspto learn more about the mission our values and hear personal stories from our employeesnbspppCalm was cofounded by Alex Tew Million Dollar Homepage and Michael Acton Smith Mind Candy Moshi Monsters FireboxppbrppstrongMissionnbspstrongppCalms Engineering team contributes directly to the company mission to make the world a happier and healthier place As a backend engineer working on the B2B product area you will be delivering experiences that provide more values to Calms fastgrowing B2B user base and help bring mental wellness to more organizationsppbrppstrongAbout the RolestrongppYou will work up and down the stack across a wide number of technologies and third party tools mainly using tools like Typescript Nodejs and PostgresppYou would collaborate with partners across the company from Marketing and Content to Data Product and Design and have plenty of opportunities to learn and grow alongside our B2B business growthppbrppstrongOutcomesnbspstrongpulliServe as a reliable goto resource on the team for backend projects writing maintainable code that can be quickly updated when needed has a low volume of bugs and is readable and easily understood by other engineers on the teamliliBe selfdirected with an ownership mindset completing work efficiently with minimal intervention from others on the team Help uncover scope early in order to establish engineering time estimates that guide prioritization decisionsliliEnsure our most frequently exercised user flows are performant and error freeliliImplement designs with tradeoff of between short and longterm flexibility and capabilitiesliliDeploy code to production maintain visibility on the status of Pull Requests and client builds as they get deployed and identify root causes and resolution actions for critical bugsliliStay up to date on the latest technologies in web development incorporating those changes which can accelerate our development speed and improve qualityliliKeep a pulse on user feedback that comes in via customer support prioritizing bug fixes that have the greatest impact on our customers and advocating for application improvements that solve common user pain pointsliliWork with product and design to create technical design and engineering plan for new featuresliliWork with product and data team to identify and tracking KPI for new featuresliliWork with web engineers to AB test new features and UX changes on Calms web application optimizing for the best outcomes for our users and the businessliulpbrppstrongCompetenciesnbspstrongpulliSolid proficiency with Nodejs or comparable eg any backend language esp Python Go RubyliliSolid proficiency with Postgresql or comparable eg MySQL MongoDBliliExperience working with REST APIsliliSolid understanding of responsive web developmentliliAbility to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirementsliliGrowth mindset receives feedback easily and incorporates it quicklyliliProactive executor thoughtful in approach and decisive in decisionsliliPragmatic balance scrappiness and rigorliliGreat technical communicatorliliStrong attention to detailliliStrong product and architectural instinctsliliEnthusiasm and passion for qualityliliTakes responsibility for making sure issues are resolved and shipped quicklyliulpbrppstrongNicetoHavesnbspstrongpulliExperience building large scale web applicationliliExperience with TypeScriptliliFamiliarity with code versioning tools eg gitliliFamiliarity with deployment CI tools eg JenkinsliliExperience working with cloud hosting platform eg AWSliliExperience working with container technologies eg Docker KubernetesliliExperience working with data team to measure impact of product featuresliliAble to deliver high quality code reviews that reduce defects and support the development of peersliliExperience working with third party libraries and tools eg OktaliliExperience and interest towards full stack ownershipliulpbrppstrongBenefitsstrongpulliCompetitive salary and equityliliTake the time you need approach to time offnbspliliCoverage for medical dental amp vision insurance planslili401KliliHome office stipendnbspliliSupportive wellbeing benefits including our EAP support and monthly wellbeing reimbursementnbspliliCommuter benefitsliliLife insurance and disability benefitsliliRemotefirst environment that allows you to work flexibly from many locationsliliOpportunity to work with a product focused on making the world happier and healthierliulpbrppCalm is deeply committed to diversity equity and inclusion both in our hiring practices and in our experiences as a Calm employee We strive to create a mindful and respectful environment where everyone can bring their authentic self to work and experience a culture that is free of harassment racism and discriminationnbspppCalm is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer We do not discriminate based upon race religion color national origin sex sexual orientation gender identity gender expression age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability genetic information political views or activity or other applicable legally protected characteristicsnbspppCalm is also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures Please inform Calms Recruiting team if you need any assistance completing any forms or to otherwise participate in the application processp
